name: vindexchain-ecosystem
description: VindexChain - The First Blockchain of Puerto Rico

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:core" "npm run dev:explorer" "npm run dev:wallet" "npm run dev:dex" "npm run dev:website"
scripts.dev:core: echo 'Blockchain core requires Go runtime - not available in WebContainer. Skipping blockchain core.'
scripts.build: npm run build:explorer && npm run build:wallet && npm run build:dex && npm run build:website
scripts.test: npm run test:core && npm run test:explorer && npm run test:wallet && npm run test:dex
scripts.test:core: cd blockchain && echo 'Go tests require Go runtime - skipping in WebContainer'

author: VindexChain Team
